pullRequest.title: Bump shot from 5.3.0 to 5.5.0
pullRequest.bodyText:
add CI option so that only failing screenshots are uploaded

Bumps shot from 5.3.0 to 5.5.0.

Release notes
Sourced from shot's releases.

Improve reports and update compose support to alpha 8
No release notes provided.
Improve public API and update compose version
Improve public API by supporting bitmaps.
Update compose version.
Improve API 29 support.



Commits

e547537 Prepare release 5.5.0
c749c3b Compose alpha 8 support (#178)
7a8a9f5 Add parameter "onlyFailing", which will prevent output of successful tests (#...
94c6bf9 Prepare next development iteration
1ede14d Prepare release 5.4.0
8cb8df2 Update all the tooling to the latest compose release (#173)
e7aa656 Shot Working on API 29+ in some cases (#168)
e5ecd2a Comopse application id using variant API and not flavor API (#170)
7f6f0fe Implement public API bitmap support (#169)
e36c6a0 Prepare next development iteration
See full diff in compare view




Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting @dependabot rebase.


Dependabot commands and options

You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR:

@dependabot rebase will rebase this PR
@dependabot recreate will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it
@dependabot merge will merge this PR after your CI passes on it
@dependabot squash and merge will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it
@dependabot cancel merge will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging
@dependabot reopen will reopen this PR if it is closed
@dependabot close will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually
